name: SpinOut (goolkasi18)
description:
SPINOUT!

Goal: Race enemy care to cross the final lap in 1st place. Laps are displayed in the top left hand corner

Controls; use WASD, arrow keys, or a controller to drive. SPACEBAR to shoot bullets to damage and destroy enemy cars for a speed boost, and SHIFT to shoot a special bullet that lets you switch places with a car if you manage to hit them and press shift again to reactivate. Try to spin around and drive backwards to shoot cars behind you!

Half destruction derby, half racing game; we hope you have fun spinning out!
